name: SYSTEM BREACH
description:
AVOID DELETION

SYSTEM BREACH is a sci-fi themed retro first person shooter where you fight hordes of enemies to see how long can you endure.

C:/ DRIVE, 20XX

A powerful virus is on its way to infect and steal the data of a computer in a space simulating the data centers of the computer, however as it reaches the Antivirus is alerted and sends out defenders to take care of and exterminate the virus. Whether the virus lives is in your hands in this simulation, you must keep it alive.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 46 under the theme “Keep It Alive” and was made in around 72 hours. Special thanks to Hades for assisting with programming and Beasauce and White Bat Audio for providing music to use.

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D - Move
LMB - Fire
SHIFT - Sprint
B - Buy Menu
1, 2, 3, 4 - Switch weapon/Purchase in Buy menu
